text: Jevha allaha pharmavila, he mariyama-putra isa! Tumacyavara ani tumacya matevara mi kelelya krpa denagice smarana kara. Jevha mi pavitra atma (jibrila) dvare tumaci madata keli. Tumhi palanyata asatana va mothya vayata lokansi sambhasana karita rahile ani jevha amhi grantha va hikamata ani taurata va injilace jnana dile ani jevha tumhi majhya hukumane paksirupa putala matine tayara karita asata ani tyata phunka marita asata, tevha majhya hukumane to (jivanta) paksi banata ase, ani tumhi majhya hukumane janmajata andhalyala ani kodhi isamala cangale karita asata, ani majhya hukumane melelyanna (jivanta karuna) bahera kadhita asata ani jevha mi isra'ilacya putranna tumacyapasuna rokhale. Jevha tumhi tyancyajavala mojija ghe'una ale tevha tyancyatale inkari loka mhanale, ki hi kevala ughada jadu ahe
